about_the_game: The Sword That Kills Christmas is a text based, bullet hell choose your own adventure game that takes you on a journey through the North pole, France and Santa Monica. On this journey your choices dictate everything. You might end up poisoning one of Santa's reindeers or trying to find your mom (you're an orphan) or something entirely different. Where will your path lead?
detailed_description:
Feature List

-Riveting bullethell action mixed with a text-based choose your own adventure story -Not in early access -Still updates every month!? New paths, battles, art and more -Beat up gingerbread men -Join Santa's rebelious son on a brooding path -Go back into your mom's womb -Stop slavery -Give Rudolph the gluckinator -Help Clemens achieve his dream -Aren't you sold on the game by now!? -Stop reading it -We won't spoil more -... -Santa gets shot on O'block


About the Game

The Sword That Kills Christmas is a text based, bullet hell choose your own adventure game that takes you on a journey through the North pole, France and Santa Monica. On this journey your choices dictate everything. You might end up poisoning one of Santa's reindeers or trying to find your mom (you're an orphan) or something entirely different. Where will your path lead?
